Name: xho-imaamismaaeelng
Author: Imaam Ismaaeel Ngqoyiyana
Source: The Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africe(IDM) , https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: Ngoko	ke	akasenaye namhlobo wakhe	osenyongweni namhlanje
Engenakutya	kumbi	ngaphandle	kwencindi	ephuma ezilondeni (ububomvu)
Akukho nabani na oya kuyitya (loo ncindi) ngaphandle kwaboni
Ukanti ukuba ngaba yena (uMuhammad) ebengaqamba iintetho zobuxoki ngaThi
Ke kaloku beSiya kumxhakamfula ngesandla sakhe sokunene
Kwaye akukho namnye kuni obeya (kuSithintela Thina) kuye
Kananjalo, Siyazi Thina okokuba phakathi kwenu kukho abaphiki
Ke kaloku yona (i’Kur’ân) iya kuba ngunobangela wokuzisola kwabangakholwayo
Umbuzi wabuza ngesohlwayo esele siza kuhla
Iingelosi noMoya (oyiNgcwele) ziya kunyuka ziye kuYe ngeMini ebude bayo bungamawaka angamashumi amahlanu
NgoMhla isibhakabhaka siya kuba njenge-oli emdaka
Akuyi kubakho mhlobo uya kubuza ngomhlobo (wakhe)
